title: (9A) of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 

1961 (Judicial Remuneration) (Section 46(9A)) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited court (supplemental provisions) act 1961 (judicial remuneration) (section 46(9a)) order 2020

title: (9A) of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of
heading: 2. This Order is deemed to have come into operation on 1 October 2020.
text_raw: 2. This Order is deemed to have come into operation on 1 October 2020.

title: (9A) of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of
heading: 3. This Order applies to a judge whose appointment to the judicial office
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a judge whose appointment to the judicial office 
concerned occurred on or after the commencement of section 10 of the Financial 
Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Amendment) Act 2011 (No. 39 of 
2011).
text_norm: 3 order applies judge whose appointment judicial office concerned occurred commencement section 10 financial emergency measure public interest (amendment) act 2011 (no 39 2011)

title: (9A) of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of
heading: 4. The annual sum payable by way of remuneration to a judge holding a
text_raw:
4. The annual sum payable by way of remuneration to a judge holding a 
judicial office specified in column (1) of the Schedule in respect of whom not 
more than 1 year has elapsed since his or her appointment to that office is the 
sum specified in column (2) of that Schedule opposite the judicial office 
specified in column (1).
text_norm: 4 annual sum payable way remuneration judge holding judicial office specified column (1) schedule respect 1 year elapsed since appointment office sum specified column (2) schedule opposite judicial office specified column (1)

title: (9A) of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of
heading: 5. The annual sum payable by way of remuneration to a judge holding a
text_raw:
5. The annual sum payable by way of remuneration to a judge holding a 
judicial office specified in column (1) of the Schedule in respect of whom more 
than 1 year but not more than 2 years have elapsed since his or her appointment 
to that office is the sum specified in column (3) of that Schedule opposite the 
judicial office specified in column (1).
text_norm: 5 annual sum payable way remuneration judge holding judicial office specified column (1) schedule respect 1 year 2 year elapsed since appointment office sum specified column (3) schedule opposite judicial office specified column (1)

title: (9A) of section 46 of the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of
heading: 6. The annual sum payable by way of remuneration to a judge holding a
text_raw:
6. The annual sum payable by way of remuneration to a judge holding a 
judicial office specified in column (1) of the Schedule in respect of whom more 
than 2 years have elapsed since his or her appointment to that office is the sum 
specified in column (4) of that Schedule opposite the judicial office specified in 
column (1). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [611] 3
text_norm: 6 annual sum payable way remuneration judge holding judicial office specified column (1) schedule respect 2 year elapsed since appointment office sum specified column (4) schedule opposite judicial office specified column (1) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th december 2020 611 3
